item.title: Mirjana add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "I wanted to change the world. But I have found that the only thing one can be sure of changing is oneself." -- Aldous Huxley

item.title: Mirjana add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "There's a world of difference between truth and facts. Facts can obscure truth." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Mirjana add a quote by B.F. Skinner
item.description: "Education is what survives when what has been learnt has been forgotten." -- B.F. Skinner

item.title: Mirjana add a quote by Samuel Taylor Coleridge
item.description: "Water, water, everywhere, And all the boards did shrink; Water, water, everywhere, Nor any drop to drink." -- Samuel Taylor Coleridge

item.title: Mirjana add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "In a time of deceit telling the truth is a revolutionary act." -- George Orwell

item.title: Mirjana add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "It was a bright cold day in April, and the clocks were striking thirteen." -- George Orwell

item.title: Mirjana add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Mirjana add a quote by William Shakespeare
Mirjana add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "If music be the food of love, play on, Give me excess of it; that surfeiting, The appetite may sicken, and so die." -- William Shakespeare
